Description: ________________________________________ BRAND NEW FROM USA AUTHORIZED JEAN MARCEL DEALER! FACTORY BOX, PAPERS & CORRECT AUTHORIZED DEALER STAMPED FACTORY WARRANTY CARD INCLUDED! From Authorized USA Jean Marcel Dealer. Free Engraving Upon Request. A .925 SOLID SILVER Power Reserve Pocket watch by Jean Marcel. EVEN the Custom Dial is Solid Silver! Only ONE was ever made!Made in the Early 1990s As a Test of the Market. BRAND NEW! The price was $3,695.00 in 1990! (See Tag) Since the twenties of the passed century, A. Gengenbach – today Jean Marcel Montres – has been producing masterpieces of Swiss watch making art. With the secure investment of a Jean Marcel watch, you will have the assurance of an exceptional product of Swiss precision watch making that will always reflect your distinctive personality and individuality. 　Tradition and progress is part of the reason why connoisseurs and collectors of Fine Swiss watches all over the world have helped contribute to the success of Jean Marcel. Model: Power Reserve,- Limited Edition- Solid .925 Sterling Silver Hunter case, And Dial- Pocketwatch! The DIAL is Solid Silver also! Jean Marcel's - POWER RESERVE -Solid Sterling Silver,- Limited Edition- Pocketwatch.BOTH The Hunter Cases open with the push of the Crown. Once for the front, Then Push again and the Back will pop open. If you purchase,-DO NOT Pry on the Cases as this is a Unique style of opening--for BOTH the front & BACK cases. •100% Pure Swiss Made. • Limited Edition. (ONE) Only ONE was ever produced. (See Factory Paper) •Movement custom modified JM H15 (base Unitas 6498), 17 Jewels, Mechanical hand-wound, small second hand at 6:00 subdial. Power Reserve Indicator at the 10:00 Position. •Solid .925 Sterling Silver Hunter case and hand Guilloche engraved Solid Silver dial with applied silver Roman numerals. •Solid .925 Sterling Silver hunting case pocket watch. Black lacquered hands. Small seconds sub dial. 52mm Diameter. Weight 110 Grams. •Custom proprietary Hardex crystal. Authorized USA JEAN MARCEL Dealer. Please see our Ebay store for All the Newest Model Genuine Jean Marcel watches, Pocketwatches & Factory Bands. We also Service Jean Marcel Timepieces. _______________________________ International Buyers – Please Note: Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying. These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up –Please Do Not confuse them for additional shipping charges. We do Not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as "gifts" - US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior. ____________________________________ A special note about your Authorized JEAN MARCEL Dealer! Sales & Service. Today there are many venues and choices available for purchasing a Top Quality item! You can also see the New Models of watches & Bands that are in stock All year long. We Thank you for looking at our internet items and we will continue to provide the best internet shopping experience with the old fashioned personal one on one our parents and grandparents expected! WWJ has one location. In the USA. Homestead, Florida 33030. Master Watchmakers Since 1957. CW-21 Certified Master Watch Repair! Your Trusted Swiss Connection! ReturnPolicy.Description:
You will be required to return the item prior to refund being issued.
We do NOT have a ship & review policy to get a look at the item.  When you purchase 
the item we have to assume you know that you want it and wish to make the 
purchase. Any Return Postage will be paid by the buyer.
The Factory Warranty will be filled out in the Buyer's name & Issued to that person.

 Once the item is used [worn] the item is not returnable.   All shipping and handling costs in connection with returns are the responsibility of the customer.

Title: Jean Marcel Pocketwatch, Only ONE Made! Solid Silver Power Reserve Hunter Case.
